dc_title_s: Galignani's plan of Paris and environs drawn by Achin.
dc_description_s: Includes inset of area map and inset showing principal objects of curiosity in Paris. 1 map;: hand col.; 42 x 54 cm., folded to 15 x 8 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: A. and W. Galignani (Firm),Achin.,Hacq, J.M., engraver.
